alert.note: Alert for Boyle; Casey; Marion (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:55AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MARION... SOUTHWESTERN BOYLE AND NORTH CENTRAL CASEY COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 AM EDT... At 1055 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lebanon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Bradfordsville, Peytons Store, Brumfield, Parksville, Forkland, Jacktown, Aliceton, Calvary and Mitchellsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
